description: Shawn Chambers is a Full Stack Engineer currently living in the Sacramento area of Northern California. He enjoys playing guitar (electric, acoustic, and bass) for his noisy creative outlet and enjoys drawing as his ‘quiet, the kids are sleeping’ cathartic time.

Storefront with three microservices working in tandem to display an image carousel, product description, and reviews for a particular product. pictures.caption: Store front with three independant microservices
Proxy server fetches three bundles and forwards requests to each server
Display updates with mocked data from Postgres DB
Infinite scroll fetching 10 reviews at a time
